item.title: Static NDP Proxying on Linux
item.description: Basics Linux comes with a feature called NDP proxying. You can declare a list of IP addresses to answer neighbor solicitation requests for, and the system will answer them for you, allowing you to receive packets for them.

item.title: Running OPNsense in VMware Fusion
item.description: Custom VM network Create a custom network vmnetX in VMware settings. Uncheck both ‚ÄúProvide addresses on this network via DHCP‚Äù and keep ‚ÄúConnect the host Mac to this network‚Äù checked before any VM connected to the network is started.

item.title: VMware Fusion Guest Features
item.description: Supported guest operating systems Only Windows and Linux. See web.archive.org/web/20241130004426/https://knowledge.broadcom.com/external/article Nested virtulization Not supported yet.

item.title: nc
item.description: Terminate on EOF Terminate the TCP connection 60 seconds after receiving an EOF on stdin. nc <IP> <port> -q 60 .

item.title: Evil Collection
item.description: Info key bindings u, Info-up: go to the superior node of this node. g1 - g9, gm, gt, gT: same as regular Info key bindings without evil. gj, gk: Info-next and Info-prev, same as n and p in regular Info key bindings.

item.title: zram on Debian 12
item.description: apt-get install systemd-zram-generator # modify config if necessary cat /etc/systemd/zram-generator.conf systemctl daemon-reload systemctl status systemd-zram-setup@zram0.service ...

item.title: Private Cloud Platforms
item.description: OpenStack OpenStack is a cloud computing platform that consists of many interrelated components. It‚Äôs great at scaling for large-scale deployment, but the platform is too complicated for small-scale deployments.
